LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.0.label: cowardly
LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.0.description: [PAWN_nameDef] always shies away from danger. [PAWN_pronoun] is usually the first to flee from battle.
LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.1.label: brave
LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.1.description: Few things scare [PAWN_nameDef]. In battle [PAWN_pronoun] stands unfazed where others panic and flee.
LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.2.label: fearless
LanguageData.Bravery.degreeDatas.2.description: [PAWN_nameDef] laughs in the face of danger. Some ascribe it to bravery, others to stupidity. Either way, [PAWN_nameDef] seems to lack any sense of self-preservation and will never flee from a threatening situation.
